entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 02:00 AM MST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -15.8°C
Wind: NNW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 26 February 2023
